_metadata.description: WP Code Check - Severity Level Customization (Example)
_metadata.instructions: This is an EXAMPLE config showing how to customize severity levels and add comments. Copy severity-levels.json to a new file, edit 'level' fields, and use --severity-config <path> to apply.
_metadata._comment: Any field starting with underscore is ignored by the parser - use for documentation

_usage_examples._comment: You can add comments anywhere in the JSON structure
_usage_examples._example_1: Document why you changed a severity level
_usage_examples._example_2: Reference a ticket number or team decision
_usage_examples._example_3: Add dates for when changes were made

spo-001-debug-code.name: Debug code in production
spo-001-debug-code.description: Console.log, debugger, alert, var_dump, print_r, error_log in production code
spo-001-debug-code._comment: Keep at CRITICAL - debug code in production is a security risk

unbounded-posts-per-page.name: Unbounded posts_per_page
unbounded-posts-per-page.description: WP_Query with posts_per_page => -1 (fetches all posts, can crash site)
unbounded-posts-per-page._comment: Downgraded to HIGH - our site has < 1000 posts, not critical yet

n-plus-one-pattern.name: Potential N+1 patterns (meta in loops)
n-plus-one-pattern.description: get_post_meta, get_user_meta, or get_term_meta called inside foreach loops
n-plus-one-pattern._comment: Upgraded to CRITICAL - we had a production incident from N+1 queries
n-plus-one-pattern._reason: Site went down when product catalog grew to 10k items

timezone-sensitive.name: Timezone-sensitive patterns (current_time/date)
timezone-sensitive.description: Using current_time() or date() without timezone awareness (can cause issues across timezones)
timezone-sensitive._note: We only operate in one timezone, so this is low priority for us

ajax-no-nonce.name: wp_ajax handlers without nonce validation
ajax-no-nonce.description: AJAX handlers missing wp_verify_nonce() or check_ajax_referer()
ajax-no-nonce._comment: Upgraded to CRITICAL per security audit requirements
ajax-no-nonce._reason: All security checks must be CRITICAL per company policy

_notes._step_3: 3. Add _comment fields to document your decisions
_notes._reminder: Never edit 'factory_default' - it's your reference to original values
